entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4. POP 40%
